title: PLANES
description: Disney The Junior Novelization is the exciting paperback retelling of the movie! PlanesÂ follows Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster who dreams of competing in the toughest and most exhilarating around-the-world air race in history. With the support of friends old and new, Dusty reaches heights he never dreamed possible-and in the process, gives a world the inspiration to soar. Children ages 8-12 who like Disney/Pixar Cars will love this complete retelling that features eight pages of full-color, action-packed scenes from the hit movie.
author: Irene Trimble
